price: ߊ߲ ߓߘߊ߫ ߓߊ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߛߎ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߛߌߟߊߛߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ( ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ )، ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߬ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫ ߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā ashyāʿakum fahal min muddakirin
